task.title: Investigate spawn timing issue where messages sent with spawn don't arrive

events.content: Identified root cause of spawn timing issue: Identified root cause of spawn timing issue

raw.question: Identified root cause of spawn timing issue
raw.chosen: Identified root cause of spawn timing issue
raw.reasoning: The issue is a race condition between 3 different systems checking for agent 'online' status, combined with the spawning agent not having access to the registry until after the task message is sent.

retrospective.summary: Found root cause: race condition between spawner registration check (connected-agents.json), isAgentOnline (agents.json with 30s threshold), and router.has(to) registry check. Task messages fail when sent before agent is in the registry.
